response.overview: Accompanied by fast-paced editing and pop music, a young GDR citizen explains that even in rural areas the latest in literature can be enjoyed without a problem. Shipping is quick and easy, everything can be found in the extensive catalogues of Buchhaus Leipzig! All you need to do is send a postcard. One of seven films in the “Buchhaus Leipzig” collection at the Leipzig State Archive.
response.title: Buchhaus Leipzig: Mail-Order Bookseller
